tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: He is a nice guy. He has great knowledge. Write ups are initially hard but always take his comments seriously. You will improve a lot. Not many homework and always come to class. He will notice your presence. Chill guy. Ask questions and you will be good. Tests are hard if you don\'t read through notes. Textbooks are not used at all. GOOD CLASS!

SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Lectures can be dry but attendance is VERY helpful.Tests aren\'t too hard but can be tricky.Consist of True/False, multiple choice, short answer and 1 essay Q. Provides an awesome study guide.Lab is easy.Field trips are fun but write-up reports can be hard.Few assignments for the year,but be mindful its a 100 pt class, gives 2 possible E.C. pts.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He is a good professor. His tests are based off of his power points but you will not understand them if you dont go to class. His tests are okay, but it is a writing emphasis course so there is essay questions. The lab reports are hard but start early and ask him questions and your golden. Although DO NOT take this as your first Geo class! I\'d wait

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This is an amazing class, and Andy is an amazing professor! You will learn more in this class that you have in your entire geologic academic career, and leave feeling amazing about your level of knowledge!

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Hard class! Definitely need to be in every class. Very interesting, but his tests are really difficult. But if you go into his office hours, it really helps and it shows him that you\'re interested in the class.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Great professor, knows his stuff and loves what he does. It\'s a challenging class. Perhaps taking other geology courses prior to this would help grade wise, but it\'s a class that is very difficult to make an A in, a B is more probable. Make use of office hours for what you don\'t understand, there\'s a lot to learn in this course.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This class was awesome, particularly the middle content. The field trips are a lot of fun-- go to both, especially the second. Andy\'s a great teacher. Trust him, he knows what he\'s talking about.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Information is highly useful and lectures are loaded with it...a bit dry though. Tests are challenging but fair. Instructor\'s knowledge is waaaay up there.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Andy is a wonderful teacher. You must attend and take good notes if you want an A. The field trips are a blast!
